attributes.description:
27 APR 2020 - MONDAY 9:23 AM IST - NITHYANANDA SATSANG (ENGLISH) - GIST

*TODAY - THIRD DAY OF THE CHITHIRAI BRAHMOTSAVAM CELEBRATION HAPPENING ALL OVER THE WORLD. SRI NITHYANANDESHWARI PARASHAKTI DEVI MEENAKSHI IS GRACING US WITH AMLANA MALA SEATED IN KAMADHENU VAHANA, AND SUNDARESHWARA PARAMASHIVA IS GRACING US IN SWARNA RISHABHA VAHANA. LET US OFFER OUR WORSHIP AT THEIR FEET.

*PARAMASHIVA'S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*EVERY COSMIC PRINCIPLE, WHEN IT IS COGNISED IN YOU AND YOU START LIVING IT, YOU ARE GROUNDED ON COSMOS. THIS IS A NEW VOCABULARY. LIKE HOW WHEN YOU WANT TO PRAISE SOMEBODY, ‘O! HE IS A GROUNDED PERSON,’ ORDINARILY WHEN SOMEONE IS GROUNDED ON SOCIETAL UNDERSTANDING ABOUT HUMAN MIND AND LIFE, YOU CALL HIM GROUNDED, I AM MAKING THE NEW VOCABULARY: GROUNDED ON COSMOS! 

*IF SOMEONE UNDERSTANDS HOW THE COSMOS MOVES, THE WHOLE COSMIC LOGIC, AND IS ESTABLISHED IN THAT, I WANT TO CALL THAT PERSON ‘GROUNDED IN COSMOS.’ 

*WE WERE DISCUSSING A FEW DAYS BACK, A BIG SNAKE APPEARED IN TIRUVANNAMALAI ASHRAM AND THEY GOT INTO PANIC AND IN THE CRANKY PANICKNESS, THE DISCIPLE STARTED MESSAGING, ‘O SWAMIJI THERE IS A BIG SNAKE. I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO.’ THE TIRUVANNAMALAI ASHRAM IS A HUGE PROPERTY - MORE THAN 3 ACRES LAND AND IT IS NEXT TO THE RESERVE FOREST. OUR BORDER IS THE RESERVE FOREST. IT IS AT THE FOOT HILL. SO WE ARE THE FIRST PRIVATE-OWNED PROPERTY. THE POOR SNAKE WILL NOT KNOW HE SHOULD NOT ENTER INTO PATTA PROPERTY. HE DOESN'T KNOW TO READ THE LEGAL DOCUMENTS!

I SAID, ‘JUST MOVE OUT FROM WHERE HE IS. HE WILL MOVE AWAY IN HALF HOUR OR ONE HOUR.’ 

*THEY IMMEDIATELY MESSAGED, ‘HE IS RAISING THE HOOD AND THREATENING ALL OF US.’ I SAID, ‘YOU GUYS WOULD HAVE DONE SOMETHING.’ THEN THEY SAID, ‘FEW DAYS BEFORE WE KILLED A SMALL SNAKE.’ IF THERE ARE KIDS YOU CAN’T VACATE IMMEDIATELY FROM THE PLACE, ONLY IF KIDS’ LIFE IS IN DANGER YOU CAN KILL EVEN A SNAKE. 

*EVEN AN ANIMAL WHICH IS DIRECTLY DANGEROUS TO YOUR LIFE CAN BE KILLED ONLY WHEN THERE ARE KIDS AND THEIR LIFE IS IN DANGER. ADULTS SHOULD THINK OF SAVING THEMSELVES. 

*THE SADHUS’ LYNCHING VIDEO WHEN I SAW, I TOLD MY KAILASAVASIS, ‘THESE CHEAP DEMONS WHO ARE KILLING THE SADHUS IN PALGHAR MAY BE SUCCESSFUL IN GRABBING THE LAND. AFTER ALL, THE WHOLE CONVERSION IS ONLY THE TACTICS OF GRABBING MORE LAND AND NATIONS - WHETHER IT IS MISSIONARY MILITANTS OR MILITANT MISSIONARIES, IT IS ALL ABOUT GRABBING LAND. IT IS A POLITICAL, STRATEGY AND CUNNING AGENDA. IT HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH COSMIC PRINCIPLE OR ENLIGHTENMENT OR SPIRITUAL TRUTHS. USING RELIGION TO GRAB LANDS, NATIONS, IS THE WORST THING. 

*WHEN I WAS SEEING THE VIDEO, I TOLD, ‘EVEN KILLING A SNAKE, WE THINK SO MANY TIMES.’ 

*ONCE MY KAILASAVASI FROM TIRUVANNAMALAI TOLD ME, THEY KILLED A SMALL SNAKE. I SAID, ‘COMPLETE WITH THE SNAKE. HE HAS COME TO ASK FOR JUSTICE.’ ON MY TRISHUL I HAD THE NAGARAJA. I APOLOGISED TO HIM AND COMPLETED WITH HIM AND REQUESTED TO MAKE SURE THAT KAILASVASIS ARE SAFE AND I WILL ALSO MAKE SURE THAT NO SNAKE IS KILLED UNLESS KIDS’ LIFE IS IN DANGER. THIS CASUAL KILLING I WILL NOT ALLOW. THE MOMENT I CONNECTED AND COMPLETED WITH NAGARAJA, IN A FEW SECONDS, THE SNAKE THAT WAS THREATENING EVERYONE FOR HOURS, DISAPPEARED INTO THE ROOF!
